features: Upper: A twist on a classic slide for an edgy and effortless look. Available in full grain leather or suede. Buckle detail with hidden gore for adjustability. Synthetic lining
Footbed: PU-like EVA with leather topcover
Midsole: Available in EVA wrap with rubber welt, cork wrap with rubber welt EVA with studded welt
Outsole: Molded rubber cupsole construction with iconic Sorel scallops
